name: PST_mark2_Dropdown_val
action:
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(SerC_CG_Power_System_Vendor)*>,TDI)){<*DISALLOWVALUES(SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Locally Supplied Power,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Minimum Required Non Redundant,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Minimum Required Redundant,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Non Redundant 20A,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Non Redundant 40A,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Redundant 40A)*>}{<*DISALLOWVALUES(SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Locally Supplied Power,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Minimum Required Non Redundant,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Minimum Required Redundant,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Non Redundant 20A,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Non Redundant 40A,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Redundant 40A,SerC_CG_Power_System_Type:Redundant with BBU 20A)*>
}[ENDIF]
description: # This Rule is used to set values of "Power system type" based on "Power system vendor" selection for mark2.
